1.content:
You are sitting in your living room, watching your favorite disney movies. You love disney movies and always love to go to disney world. Disney has been in your childhood and you have no other interests.

Well, maybe one other interest.

You found yourself to be attracted to anything that seemed bigger than you. You wondered why you felt that way, so you look it up. It turns out, you're a "macrophiliac", or someone who has a fetish for giants or giantesses (wink wink). You loved anything that looked giant to you. From ponies, to just regular humans.

You especially love it when disney does it. Though they never really do it with animated movies. But either way, you loved it. "Heh, maybe one day I'll finally see it. And it sure would be nice to see it in person. *sigh* Oh well, it's wishful thinking."

With that, you hop in bed, and get ready to sleep. Once you are out, the wishing star hears your wish, and grants it.

Okay "wishing star", where will you go?
1.title: Wishful Thinking

11.content:
You wake up slowly and feel very uncomfortable. It feels like you were sleeping on some rocks. Once you really opened your eyes, and looked around, it seems you were. You looked around and all you can see are small rocks all around. And there were even bigger rocks then that, and BIGGER rocks then that. "Wow, how am I in the mountains?!" You start to panic. And it gets worse when you look even closer.

When you look at some of the lands vegitation, you notice they are long, leaf-like stalks that towered 50 feet over you. Then the thought hits you like a truck. "I'M IN THE GRASS, I SHRANK!!!" You are running around and then feel vibrations in the ground. You look and see a stampeed of ants coming your way. And thankfully, you are able to move out of there way just in time. And it's weird, but everything looks..... cartoonish. But why?

Just then, the earth started to shake again. But this time, it was even BIGGER than before. You can barrely stand now. You look up and see what the ants were running from, as you saw a pair of looming mountains stomping your way.


After a better look, you can surprisingly see it's......
11.title: The Lion King

111.content: After a better look, you can surprisingly see it's the young...
111.title: Young lion

1111.content:
You gaze in terrified awe of the lioness. You take a few steps backward before her paw comes crashing down on top of you!

"AH!" You scream, terrified that she has crushed your legs! But she hasn't! Her paw feels heavy, but is soft enough so that it can't hurt you! You smile as you see that you are okay, but your joy leaves you as you see the young lioness looking down curiously at you.

"What the? " She lifts her paw and you try to push yourself away from the towering lioness. She sees you in all of your tiny glory and smiles. "Well hello there tiny bug!" She lowers herself to look at you, her massive smiling face in front of you. She grins and looks you over. "Huh,,,, I've never seen a bug like you before.... hm.... I wonder?.....
1111.title: Just you and Giant Nala...

11111.content:
You take a deep breath, exhale, and decide to introduce yourself.
" Well, I'm a human."you say confidently.
"Oh, so you can talk! " the illness replies, taken by surprise. "Well, if you introduced yourself, I should, too. I'm Nala."
You stick out your tiny hand to give her a handshake, and you shake one of the toes on her massive paw. Then, you see it come behind you as Nala's paw bring you closer to her face.
"So, how'd someone like you get in the middle of the grasslands? With all this flesh and muscle on ya, you look like you would have been eaten up by now." She remarks, before snapping her jaws at you, making you scream in fear.
"Ah, relax! I wouldn't do that to you! Your species is probably too rare, anyway." Apparently, she's never seen humans before.
The lioness then proceeds to give you a big lick, her rough tongue almost coating you in saliva. "Hmm... I got an idea." Nala says while you try to get the gross liquid off you.
"Let's...
11111.title: Are you a man or a mouse-sized man?

111111.content:
You stare up at the lioness cub. "Cat and mouse? No! That sounds way too dangerous!"

"Relax," Nala says, lying down before you with her legs stretched out to your left and right, striking a pose just like the Sphinx. "I'm not gonna eat you! My stents always said not to eat anything that's rare, and I've never seen anything like you before, so that means you're super rare! So don't worry, I just wanna have some fun!"

You look into her pale green eyes, and decide you might as well play along. "Just don't hurt me, okay?" you remind her.

The cub grins at you, baring some fangs, but she doesn't do so menacingly. "Alright! I won't hurt you. Now, let's play! You start running! I'll give you a head start. Go!"

Nala lowers her head to the ground and covers her eyes with her paws. You start running as soon as she said go, and try looking for a place to hide.You see a nearby rock, and dive behind it, hiding amongst some short grass and hoping. You will be hidden here. You hear Nala call out that she's coming for you, and hear steps approaching a bit before Nala appears and walks past the rock, sniffing the air. You freeze up as you realize she can probably smell you...
111111.title: Play cat and mouse

choices: She's gone a different direction, and loses you completely
She really is just that sneaky, and catches you again
1111111.content:
And sure enough, the giant lioness cub suddenly snaps her head to the side, staring right at you. You get up and bolt, but then a huge yellow paw slams down in front of you, and you fall over backwards to find yourself looking up at Nala. The young lioness smirks and raises a paw before placing it on top of you, covering your body from the chest down, pinning you and pushing your torso down.

"Pinned ya," she says.

You squirm under her paw, but she just giggles. "You can't even get out, can you?" she asks. "Okay, there's no fun in just holding you down. I'll let you go, and give you another head start. But first..."

Nala lowers her head towards you, and you struggle more, but still to no avail. You stop struggling and freeze up in surprise as her rough tongue sticks out of her mouth and runs over your face, coating it in drool. You cough, and Nala licks her lips a bit before lifting her paw off of you.

"Each time I catch you, I get to lick you," she said. "I'll lick you twice next time, then three times, then four... So, unless you like getting slobbered, try to hide better next time."

She smirks at you again, then lowers her head to the ground, covers her eyes, and starts counting again. You waste a few seconds wiping slobber from your face, and start running too late to get to cover.

"Ready or not, here I... Wait, really?" she says. You stop running, and turn to see her walking towards you, frowning down at you. You stay still, but flinch as she raised a paw and pushes you over. You fall onto your back, and before you can get up, she pins you again under her paw.

"You didn't even hide that time," she said. "Don't tell me you're tired already? Or... Maybe you actually like getting licked?"

You feel yourself blush slightly. Though getting covered in saliva is gross, you have to admit that the softness and warmth of the lioness' tongue is a bit comforting. But even so, you don't fully enjoy it, and shake your head in response to Nala's inquiry.

"No, I just... Wasted some time cleaning myself off," you say. "I don't want to walk around with lion drool on me."

Nala smirks at you again. "Well. If you don't want that..."

She leans down and licks your face again, pulling back her tongue and letting you take a breath before licking you another time.

"...Hide better this time," she says as she releases you from under her paw.

You stand and immediately start to run, making it to a patch of tall grass and running through, not stopping. You hear Nala say she's coming, and hear her steps get louder and louder behind you as you keep running. Though you know she is gentle, you still feel afraid of getting caught. Being licked more and more times each time you're caught doesn't fully appeal to you.

You slow down and stop when you realize you can't hear Nala's steps anymore. You look around, but can't see anything through the tall grass. Did she stop chasing you, or is she just that sneaky?
1111111.title: She notices you

choices: She Realizes What She's Done and Lets You Out
11111112.content:
Nala really was that sneaky and before you knew it she had pinned you to the ground. "Ok, you must want me to lick you if your hiding that poorly" she said in a teasing manner. "Yeah, yeah, yeah just get it over with" you said in a huff. Nala laid down still keeping you pinned under her paw and proceeded to lick you a lot more than she was supposed too.

You couldn't tell her to stop because her big, wet, slimy tongue was targeting your face a lot. When she finally paused for a moment after 30 plus licks you asked "Why the hell did you lick me so much", "I know you liked it" she said with a devious smile, this made you blush a lot.

Suddenly Nala's stomach growled. "Who oh, boy am I hungry all of a sudden" she exclaimed, you gulped and looked up at her anxiously. Nala looked down at you and licked her lips, "You look good enough to eat!" she said giggling afterwards. You nervously chuckled with her. "You do taste really good though, like really good." she said.

Her stomach growled again, a lot louder than before. She looked at her belly, then back at you and paused for a moment. "I'm sorry, I'm just really hungry" she said opening her mouth and closing it around you. "Wait!" you yelled, but were cut off when her lips sealed. You were tossed around her mouth a bunch while she tasted you.

Her tongue was soft, wet and slimy and her mouth was hot and humid. You could see her uvula hanging above her deep, hot throat. You were afraid of what came next.

*GULP*
You slid down her tight, pulsating throat for what felt like forever. Eventually though you fell into her not so big, slimy, acid filled stomach. You immediately started to bang on her stomach walls pleading for her to let you out. She really enjoyed the feeling of you squirming and laid on her back, patting her stomach.
11111112.title: Hungry Nala

111112.content: With that Nala seemed to pick you up with ease with her gigantic paw, holding you in between two of her "fingers". "Huh, I didn't realize how small you really were." Sure you were now only a measly 4 in. tall but she didn't have to remind you. "Ya, I know but can we talk about something other than my size," you asked. "I don't think we'll be doing much talking," Nala then said. She then proceeded to put you in her mouth. She rolled you around a little with her tongue and then took off to Pride Rock. She got back to Pride Rock and walked into her own personal area. There she spit you out and rolled you onto your back. You and Nala were alone now. I have an idea... why don't we wrestle??? You then respond with a simple_____________________!
111112.title: ...go back to Pride Rock."

She opens her mouth, but you step back shouting, "WAIT! No Nono no."

Does she stop?

choices: She wants to swallow you whole
She wants to give you to Simba
111122.content:
Though she heard you yell, she doesn't care about what you think. She grabs you with her mouth and starts to suck on you. You start to struggle as she covers you in saliva. She suddenly opens her mouth, causing you to fall to the ground.

"You taste pretty good. I bet you would make a great afternoon snack." Nala says, reaching for you again. You try to back up, only for her to grab your legs.
111122.title: The taste test

1111222.content:
“Wait...WHAT?” You scream. She giggles and picks you up. “STOP!” You scream.

Does she?
1111222.title: She wants to swallow you whole

11112221.content:
Fear getting the best of you, you keep getting pulled into the mouth. Not wanting to be eaten you turn around and with the strongest hit you can muster. You bonk her on the nose.

“Ow” She said as she opened her mouth just enough for you to fall down on the savannah ground. Looking at the giant lioness, you can tell that she is beyond annoyed.

“You know what, i was just teasing you before but now. Im looking at you and think your going to make quite the meal” She said, finishing off with moving her tongue in a hungry look. Not needing to be told twice, you get up and start running away from her, or at least you tried until her paw came down on you once again. This time feeling more heavier as you doubt she held anything back. Then in an almost flawless transition, she laid down on her stomach and covered all your escape routes with her paws.

“Nowhere to run now my little Meal” She said as you knew your only option as this point was to reason with her.

“Wait... how about we talk about this?”

“How about no” She answered back as she then brought her head to you. In an instant you found yourself no longer in the open like you were, instead you were in her mouth!. It was dark and you couldn't see, however you could feel the wet tongue you were on.

“You know i was told never to play with my food cause then it might get away, but with you ill make an exception” The Cub said, every time she opened her mouth you got bits of sunlight. However due to this you saw the terrifying look of her sharp young teeth. Suddenly you found the tongue you were on start throwing you around in the mouth. Scrapping you against the cheek of the animal as she started licking you around, much like a normal person would do to a candy they just got.

You try to avoid the tongue as often as you can however your attempts keep getting cut off. Considering that you don't want to go near her sharp teeth or down her throat, you've found yourself trapped on numerous occasions.

Which Nala liked, she liked a lot. She loves toying with her prey, licking up the smaller body as it tries to escape. ‘Wheres it gonna go’ Nala thought loving the idea. Not only that but the Bug tasted better then she thought it would, maybe all bugs did taste this good and she's just never known. Or maybe this is a rare breed that she just doesn't know about. Because if thats the case she needs to find where their habitat is and fast.

“Ive think I've staled this long enough little Buggy” Nala said her tongue going away from you. “Down the hole you go bug” She then craned her head back, trying to make gravity do the work and make you fall into her stomach
11112221.title: Nala's Bug Meal

111122211.content:
Sadly for you, your grip fails and you fall down her gullet. Your whole body shooke when Nala purred at your struggles. She lay down and began to groom herself, letting her stomach do the rest. You never stand a chance. A few moments later Nala stood back up and looked at her fat ass. "I think I know who to add to this," she said, thinking of a certain prince.



When you wake up you find yourself in the world of...
111122211.title: You fall down her throat (Death)

choices: Simba doesn't notice you and squishes you with his paws

1112.content:
After a better look, you can surprisingly see it's young Simba all alone, walking and happily smiling to himself.

You look up in confusion, looking at the cub in awe, amazed at the sight before you. If your eyes didn't deceive you, each of the orange-coloured legs was the size of a building and they were slowly coming nearer at you, with no intent of slowing down. For a few seconds, you watched the fur-covered buildings make a loud thud when they hit the ground. mildly disorientating your senses for a good second or too. With panic and adrenaline rushing through your body, you followed your first instinct to take a few steps backwards, only to realise that the two front paws were advancing far too fast for you to cover any ground. Before you even made more than ten steps, you tripped and fell to the ground on your bottom, on a pile of rounded pebbles.

As another thud echoed through the area, you were cut short from being fazed, recovering and sprinting away from the advancing golden yellow cub that was still completely unaware of your presence. As you started to sprint for your life, you try to shout out his name to get his attention. In only a few seconds, you were exhausted and you couldn't go any further. The lion was no more than three seconds from your position right now and your chances of survival was dwindling rapidly in milliseconds. You only had one last move up your sleeve.

"SIMBA!"

With your last burst of energy in your body, you shouted loudly as you could, hoping that this time, Simba's ears would pick up on something.
1112.title: Just you and a Giant Simba

It was a thick grouping of bushes, secluded.... off the beaten path as the lioness lowers her body to the ground. You oblige her unspoken direction and slide off. "Something wrong?" you asked the future queen.

"I'm sorry strange little one... but I've gone... well... into the.... urges." she replied, her back-end quivering a bit. "Simba and I recently... took our relationship to new heights... but... well... I still have a very.... persistent itch." Needless to say, your heart sank... did Nala just tell you she was in the throes of HEAT? And juding from the look she's giving you... the lioness seems to wanna indulge this passion.
"Are you... suggesting that I... We.... you know..." you hesitantly inquire as a thick musky smell fills the air. Nala nervously nods in the affirmative as she turns around, showing her back-end to you. The intense heat and moisture could even be felt from your perspective... your limited size.

"Can't focus... need to...." mumbled the frazzled lioness as she-

The mountains you see are two lions. A dark brown male with a black mane, and a standard looking female who walked, or to you stomped beside him. Another weird thing that you noticed, even though being tiny here wasn't weird enough, these lions were cartoons too. They look familiar too.

115332.title: Kiara and Kovu?

1153321.content:
As you finally close your eyes to embrace the darkness of light, a sudden white light encompasses your view as you find yourself waking up. "Ughh..morning already?" you grumble as the brightness before your eyes slowly starts to fade away. With a quick rub of your eyes, you soon raise your head up to find a rather odd sight. Gone were the walls and furniture of your room as a vast plain of dirt and grass surrounded your entire body. "W-what the!?" You immediately scramble up in utter confusion as you gaze about your alien location dumbfounded. "W-Where am I? this isn't my room?" you think to yourself.

While your eyes continue to circle about the strange land, a sudden tremor begins to emerge from nearby. Shocked, you gaze down at the ground as you notice small loose pebbles begin to bounce lightly from the quakes. The force of the odd blows below you soon begin to increase in strength as a sudden large shadow overcasts above you. Terrified, you remain perfectly motionless for a brief second uncertain just what creature stood behind you. In your head, your brain was practically shouting at you to rush off, however, your body seemed to shutdown all control leaving you shuddering helplessly.

Whatever it was behind you seemed to remain perfectly still as the tremors from earlier completely ceased altogether. Just then, a sudden hot wind begins to hit the back of your body as the odd thing starts to breath behind you. "huh?" a female voice rings out from 6oclock to your utter surprise. "Are you okay?" the voice asks with a hint of confusion in it's tone. The sound of the voice luckily manages to calm your nerves slightly as whatever was talking didn't seem hostile in nature. "I-I'm fine." you stammer in a meek tone while desperately trying to regain control of your body. "Are you sure? you're as straight as a twig." the voice replies back.

"Yeah, I'm fine." you assure her while releasing a long sigh. With a few of your muscles back in control, you slowly attempt to turn your body to gaze up at the speaker. "It's just that I seem kinda-" A gasp interjects your sentence as you manage to finally gaze upon the voices owner in disbelief. Standing mere yards away from you was a massive lioness. Her brown pupils were focused entirely on your body as you were awestruck by her form. Despite the shocking sight, you could've sworn you've seen this lioness somewhere before. After a second or so of mind delving you can't help but notice that this lioness was none other than Kiara from the lion king movies!

"Kinda...what?" Kiara asks with a raised brow as her head shifts curiously to the size. "Just...Kinda lost..." You finish in a much softer tone than before, still awestruck by the discovery. "Lost?" she says before crouching down so her snout was mere feet away from you. "Awww, you poor mouse." A pitied expression takes up her face as her eyes continue to gaze at you in a rather cross eyed fashion. "Mouse?..." you stammer. "E-errmm I'm not a mouse." You reply while waving your hands up to dismiss the assumption. "You're not?" Kiara asks as her curious expression once again returns. "Then...just what are you?" "I'm...well, how do I put this?" You murmur, unsure if she even knew what a human being was. "Are you sure you're not a mouse?" Kiara asks once more as she squints her eyes slightly to get a better glimpse at you. "I mean, you're tiny and all that." "I'm not a-" A defeated groan emerges as you give your head a single shake. "Well...just think of me whatever you want." you conclude, seeing as how explaining your species would take quite some time to complete.

"So, what are you doing out here in the pride lands?" Kiara asks as her tail swishes behind her. "Well...I just happened to stumble upon here." you reply vaguely, doubting she'd even understand your story. "Huh, that's strange. Anyways Little mousey how about-"
1153321.title: Kiara

Kiara noticed that I was trembling. “Are you ok little mousey?” Kiara asked. “Yeah, anyway, what happens if I lose the game?” I asked, nervously. “The cat eats the mouse.” “It’s just the Circle of Life.” Kiara said. DON'T YOU DARE!" you exclaim. "DON'T YOU...." before you could finish shouting, Alana lunges at you and eats you alive. She coughs violently and you are free from their mouths. Now you begin to scold them, yelling at the top of your lungs. "I HAVE HAD ENOUGH OF YOU GIRLS EATING ME! IT WAS BAD ENOUGH WHEN ARIEL WAS THE ONE I WAS WITH, BUT YOU.... YOU HAVE NO IDEA WHAT IT'S LIKE TO BE TOSSED BY A GIANT TONGUE AND JUST HANGING ABOVE SOMEONE'S THROAT! HAD I KNOWN THAT YOU GIRLS WOULD BE EVEN MORE TERRIFYING THAN ARIEL, I'D HAVE LET HER SWALLOW ME!" They just stare at you with frightened looks, or at least you thought. "Um..." Adella says. "WHAT?!" You yell. She just points a finger in your direction. Your face goes from angry to scared. "She's right behind me, isn't she." They nod and you turn around. Ariel stood there, glaring at you in anger.

"Oh hey... I was just talking about you." you nervously say. "What was that about me being terrifying?!" Ariel sternly asked. "Um... I'm sorry?"
1211112122122122211111121.title: NOPE! WRONG AGAIN!

12111121221221222111111211.content:
"Well, I suppose I can forgive you for swimming off like that. But we'll be keeping an eye on you!" she says. "We?" you whimper with wide eyes. You turn to face her sisters who kept eating you. "Um... may I ask why you're trying to keep me here? Apart from being mad at me." Ariel looks at you with a stern frown. "I'm very curious about the human world and seek to know more about it, and your size just makes you look kinda cute." "Yeah, my size also makes you girls look scary from my point of view. Really doesn't help when you're placing me in your bra or trying to eat me." you explain.

Ariel felt compassion upon hearing your confession. "Okay then. I guess we should apologize for that. Although I would still like for you to stay with us." she says. "I don't have a choice do I?" you ask. "Not really. But we will do our best not to eat you. Can't make any promises though, if by accident or we need to hide you from daddy." she replies. You sigh in relief. "So could you also, for the sake of transportation, have me be on your shoulder or your hair? Not comfortable being close to your more 'private' areas, and my grip isn't all that great so I thing your fins are out of the question." you request. "Fine by me." The light from the surface grows dimmer by the minute and the girls get ready for bed. You consider yourself lucky this time, but there's no telling what will happen tomorrow. To be on the safe side, you go to sleep near the mirrors so you don't get squished in our sleep.

The next morning, the girls wake up and are informed that King Triton is on vacation. This leaves them with no reason to hide you from him, for now at least. What do they do with you?

"I just wanted to say sorry about before." Ariel says with a slight frown. Your fear turns to concern. "I never meant to scare you nor cause you harm. I was just so excited to see a human of your size." "A little too excited for my tastes." you say. "All I ask is that you stay here in Atlantica. I promise I won't do anything to harm or scare you." She crosses her heart. Ultimately, you decide it was your best bet, seeing as you'd be unlikely to survive out in the vast sea or on land. "Okay, I'll stay. But only under several conditions." Ariel smiles gleefully.

You state your terms. "First off, under NO circumstances are you to eat me! Considering one of your sisters did, I'd rather stay out of your mouth. Second, nothing concerning your 'private' areas. Third, try to keep me away from your semi-cannibalistic sisters. And lastly, no flirting!" Ariel thinks. "Well, I can't exactly promise that first one, since there's a chance you could wind up in my food, or if my father shows up and I can't think of any other place. Other than that, I accept." You sigh. "Anyway I should be on my way." she says. "Got some collecting to do. If you wanna come along, you can ride in my hair."

What will you do?

1211112122122211.content:
Ariel took you out of her cleavage, holding you tightly in her soft, yet enormous, digits as she lay on her spongy mattress, gazing adoringly at you. She's holding you only about a foot from her face - a good two-story drop from your perspective - as her luscious red hair bobs idly in the water. A fleeting vision of that hair snagging you like a sea serpent flits across your mind's eye, but what Ariel says next squelches any such silly fears.

"Okay, little human, you can sleep with me," she says brightly.

Having any girl say that to you would, naturally, make you lose your mind. But a fabled DISNEY PRINCESS who was at least fifteen times your size? It was a wonder your hard-on didn't rip clean out of your pants. Then again, this is a mermaid we're talking about. Her privates probably consists of a fish's cloaca. You had reservations about being used as a dildo in a fish cloaca.

Judging by Ariel's confused look at your excitement, however, she clearly did not mean it the way you first thought. Relief mingles with minor disappointment.

"So try to get a lot of sleep, my precious little human. There's so much I want us to do together in the morning!" Ariel cries, squealing with delight. With that, she brings you back down to her face, and you cry out in surprise as Ariel once again presses those huge lips against you, practically engulfing you in that tempting flesh. You try to kiss her back, licking across those huge lips, but you doubt Ariel even feels it. Besides, she probably doesn't like you in THAT way. By her own admission, she sees you as a pet!

Again, disappointment dulls the thrill of what should have been a dream come true. You're so wrapped up in this, at first you don't sense the rush of water. Ariel's moving you again, a little too roughly. And once more, you find yourself wedged into the young mermaid's lush bosom. Not as deeply as when Ariel snuck you into the palace, but you're good and trapped nonetheless.

And so, Ariel laid back on her bed, facing straight up so as not you crush you, her darling little pet. Occasionally, she would gently stroke your hair with her fingertip, or rub your chest. All the while, her gigantic breasts squeezed you slightly every time Ariel drew a breath. "Hmmm, maybe I can get used to being Ariel's new pet," you murmur, relishing her loving attention and the inviting feel of her flesh.

Between the rhythmic beating of Ariel's heart, the softness of her skin, and the strange, comforting feel of an aquatic environment...it all served to lull you into a light sleep. Ariel fell asleep around the same time, still petting you, her beloved pet human, up until she drifted off. Though you couldn't see it, Ariel was smiling in her sleep, still thrilled at the prospect of having a tiny human friend.
1211112122122211.title: Bunking with a giant mermaid.

121111212212221111.content:
As Ariel drifted back to sleep, her deathhold on you began to slacken. Soon enough, you slide out from between her hand and her cheek. Desperate to put some distance between you and the titanic mermaid, you swim away. But you weren't looking at where you were going, and wind up entangled in some of Ariel's long, red hair.

At first, you panic, desperately fighting off those soft yet thick red tendrils that have ensnared you. But you force yourself to calm down; if you pull at her hair too tightly, Ariel was liable to awaken again.

So for a moment, you bobbed idly in the water, still caught up in Ariel's hair. You take a deep breath, but it hardly calms you, as the sensation of water filling your lungs is still an alien one. Nevertheless, with a renewed sense of calm, you soon manage to detangle yourself from Ariel's long, beautiful hair.

Once free, you knife up into the water, amazing at how easily swimming has become. Still, you ache all over from Ariel's vise-like grip. "Heh, I can now tolerate the pressure and low temperatures of the ocean's floor, and what taxed me to the limit? Hugs and cuddles from a giant mermaid," you mutter to yourself.

You now have a golden opportunity to flee, and get away from this clingy mermaid. But as you look back down at Ariel, you suddenly feel hesitant. That angelic picture of Ariel sleeping, smiling to herself... Was she dreaming of you? It suddenly felt wrong to ditch a beautiful mermaid like this. Not only would she worry herself sick (she had rightly pointed out the dangers you would face on your own), but she genuinely cared for you as a friend, not just a pet.

1211112122122211111.content:
Conflicting feelings well up within you once more as you let yourself sink back down to Ariel's bed. You sit down near the edge, but you're still so close to Ariel's head, her angelic face and long red hair, still flowing like a living thing in the water, take up your entire field of vision.

In many ways, your innocent little wish has been granted. Here you are, sitting before a gigantic version of a Disney character you always idolized, and she genuinely wanted to be your lifelong friend. It's not like you had many opportunity for career advancement or hope with the ladies back home. Now, this beautiful, rambunctious mermaid wanted to take care of you forever, an impossibly divine presence looming over you like a loving goddess.

Despite your mixed feelings about also being Ariel's captive, you walk over to her, careful not to fall into the holes in the spongy mattress. Soon, you're only an inch or two from Ariel's face. You suddenly feel a rush of water go past you. Ariel's luscious lips tha already kissed you so often...they're slightly parted, and she was breathing out through her mouth. "I wonder if that's a healthy sleeping position for a mermaid," you think aloud as another rush of water blasts past you. It felt strangely warm and comforting. To think, even the BREATHING of this titanic beauty could flatten you. And it was that sort of sheer power from a giant woman that fascinated you.

Some strands of Ariel's hair brushed past you, but nowhere near enough to snag you all over again. You take it in your hands and stroke it. It felt...so silky and inviting. As if you could just dive in Ariel's hair and revel in the sensation.

You decide, against your better judgment, to stay. But...come morning, you had to discuss things with Ariel from a position of strength. Or at least, show that you weren't willing to be treated like a helpless pet. So no crawling back into Ariel's hands. Though as you looked at Ariel's hand again...those long, delicate-looking digits as thick as telephone poles, that open palm that looked so soft and inviting.... Hopefully, in the morning, you could enjoy being caressed and embraced by those hands, if only Ariel would be more gentle....

Nearly ten minutes had passed since your big break, and still no sign of pursuit. You're amazed at the distance you've put between yourself and Ariel's room in that time. "Hmph, you would think the Square-Cube Law's benefits to shrunken people would be offset by the sheer water pressure down here," you tell yourself.

Still, ever so cautious, you constantly glance up. If any low-swimming fish or octopus or whatever caught wind of you, you were seafood. So you kept close to the rocks, and swam through big patches of stalks of underwater algae for cover. Occasionally, you swam alongside schools of fish that were your size. Oh sure, they look ready to crap themselves (hopefully not near you), but most just went with it. All in all, it sure felt like a magical moment that could only happen in, well, Disney movies. And it was one hell of a marine biology lesson, that was for sure.

But just as hope was welling up within you, you hear Ariel's voice. Your heart skips a beat as you look up. Ariel's swimming about thirty feet overhead, and she's calling for you!

"Oh yeah, call out for the shrunken human you snuck into the palace, that's real smart," you mutter sarcastically. When Ariel suddenly glances down, you're afraid she heard you! However, Ariel was so high up, the size difference so great, and it was rather murky on the ocean floor at night....

Not wanting to take chances, you frantically look around for a place to hide. There's no more long stalks of seaweed or algae to hide in, but there was a small hole nearby. Seeing no other option, you swim right for it. After ducking inside the little hole, you timidly peek out and see that....

121111212212221111221121.content:
When your eyes flutter open again, the first thing you realize is...you're cold. Very very cold! Seriously, your entire body feels like it's one little block of ice. Also, it's still nighttime, as very little light is penetrating through the water. Swirling shapes of dark green bob and ripple above you, so you figure you landed in another field of algae stalks.

Groaning, you try to get up, but again, a bitter chill roots you to the spot. Your muscles are frozen stiff, and refuse to respond. Also, you notice how hard it's gotten to breathe. "Lovely. I can magically breathe water now, but I can still get hypothermia," you mutter to no one in particular.

But those few words were just enough to attract attention. An instant later, something knifes down at you through the darkness. Two huge hands swoop down and pull back the algae stalks, and then you can make out Ariel's ginormous face in the shadowy gloom. It soon takes up your entire field of vision, those huge blue eyes fixed on you. But that gleeful, sprightly air Ariel had when she first met you was gone, replaced by a frosty gaze that, somehow, made you feel even COLDER!

It only got worse when Ariel spoke. "Didn't I TELL you you wouldn't make it on your own out here!?" she bellows. The pressure waves from Ariel's vehement shout wash over you; you feel as if the water's crushing you against the sand. "Even if you're fast enough to avoid getting eaten, do you know where to find stuff YOU can eat!? And let's not forget your current problem..."

Your eyes widened a little. What did Ariel mean by that? But Ariel didn't give you long to dwell on it. Before you know it, those huge fingers of hers slid underneath you, carefully hoisting your exhausted shrunken body off the ocean floor. Vertigo mingled with your deathly chill as she swiftly brought you up, and then Ariel roughly stuffed you in her....

The next thing you know, Ariel's nose and mouth fill your field of vision...and suddenly that mammoth maw opens wide! Two rows of perfect pearly whites that gleam in the watery gloom, a huge tongue that looked ready to savor your taste....

"Ariel, what're you doing...." That was supposed to be a scream, but you're so weak, it comes out as a pitiful squeal. You're barely able to squirm as Ariel lowers you into her mouth. She deposits you on her tongue; being somewhere between two and three inches tall, you don't even come close to covering it. It feels as if that huge, mattress-like muscle will swallow you up! Then, with a loud clack, Ariel's jaws snap shut. Now you're in complete darkness, except for what little light filters in through Ariel's teeth; for some reason, she hasn't closed her lips. And the only sound you hear is the plangent rush of water through Ariel's mouth as she breathed.

12111121221222111122112111.content:
Though in near-darkness, having water constant rush back and forth past you, and being cold and afraid, you can tell Ariel is swimming at top speed. Back to her grotto or the palace, you can't tell. And naturally, you're more worried about what Ariel plans to do with you than where she's going. You expect to be tossed back into Ariel's throat any second. Too weak to resist, you can only lie there on Ariel's hot, rough tongue, your heart hammering harder than ever. Occasionally, you bob around a little in Ariel's mouth. After a few moments of swimming, however, Ariel uses her tongue to press you against the roof of her mouth. You squeal as that huge muscle pins you against the mermaid hard palate, but you're far too exhausted and weak to so much as squirm.

You have no idea how long Ariel swam with you hidden in her mouth, but eventually, you notice you don't feel so cold anymore. Your muscles loosen a little and your heart rate and breathing steady, though you still don't feel up to wrestling free of Ariel's tongue.

After what seemed an eternity, Ariel roughly spits you out. The suddenness takes you by surprise, and you find yourself slowly sinking back down onto Ariel's pillow. Still tired and very dazed, it's a while before you're able to look back up to Ariel. Her billboard-sized face looms over you once more, and her anger hasn't abated one iota.

"Good to see my mouth warmed you up, just like I hoped. And here I used to think humans were smart," Ariel growled at you, shaking her head. That flowing red hair rippled in the water, and you feared a lock would snare you. "But I guess it never occurred to you that if a human suddenly finds himself bite-sized and down here in the sea, temperature may be a problem. You can't count on the sun's energy as much down here, and at night...well, look what happened! Why ELSE do you think I wanted you to sleep in my, well...you know! To keep you WARM!"

Eyes widening in surprise as you look up at Ariel, you realize how absurd it was to forget this mermaid wasn't some frivolous nincompoop. Ariel actually seemed to have a better grasp on the situation than you do. "B-B-B-But, w-w-why didn't you say so?" you ask meekly.

"Because I thought a human would smart enough to figure it out!" Ariel snapped. The force of her shout almost blew you back into one of the pillow's holes. "Looks like we BOTH have a lot to learn about each other's worlds!"

1212.content:
You surfaced and gasped for breath, you quickly grabbed a piece of floating wreckage as you watched your fishing boat sink deep beneath the sea. You cursed, this was bad, stuck in the middle of the ocean with no way of contacting help, no supplies and no chance of rescue.

Meanwhile, beneath the sea swimming close to the surface the red headed mermaid Ariel swam aimlessly. She'd heard that a human had passed by this place with what is called a boat, according to her Dolphin friends, but so far all she'd found no boat and no human. Ariel loved humans and loved collecting all things human.

Suddenly she spotted something slowly descending in the water. She swam towards it and caught it in her hands. It looked like a human boat, but this was over ten times too small, a human who used this would have to been no bigger than 2 inches tall.

She decided she was going to keep this when she spotted something above her. It looked like a human on the surface of the water, but Ariel was just a meter beneath the surface so how could what she was looking at be a human.

She decided to surface and inspect it.

From your point of view it looked like some sea monster was surfacing in front of you. You froze in fear, but what surfaced was a stream of red hair followed by a pretty face with big, blue eyes, a large mouth with big lips. The two eyes focused on you and first her face first became astonished, then delighted.

"Wow, a real human but..." she lowered her head over you to get a good look at you. "... you're tiny!"

"You're, you're a giant girl?" you stammered

"Actually" and from behind you a massive tail appeared "I'm a mermaid, I'm called Ariel"

Ariel began to surface more beneath you, a clam shell bra appeared in front of you and from under you her slender stomach came up. You now lay on her stomach, gasping for breath.

You introduce yourself as you try to stand, you lose your footing on this soft, fleshy surface and took a step back and fell into her belly button. Ariel laughed at this.

"You're cute, may I keep you?" she asked "I love to collect human things and you would be the pride of my collection"

With her other hand, she runs her finger over your backside, and then slips it up to feel your front. You grit your teeth and blush like crazy.
"Then what did happen to you?" She asks. She's brought you close there face again and you can feel her hot breath as her curious gaze keeps traveling over your naked form. You make an effort to cover yourself with your hands, but she just pulls your arms up.
"I don't know." You say, "I was in my bedroom, bored out of my mind, and I..."
She stops messing with you. "You what?"
"I... made a wish."
"A wish?!" In her excitement, she closes her hand sharply around you. You're not crushed, but you're definitely not comfortable. "So then this is magic! I can help with that!"
She suddenly realizes what she did and opens her hand.
"Oh my gosh!" She says, setting you down gently on the rock. "Are you okay? Did I hurt you?"
You lie there for a moment, catching your breath before you try to say anything. "No." You manage to say between breaths. "No, no, I'm fine. Just fine."
"That's a relief." She says. "You can take a lot of punishment for something your size, then."
You get to your feet. "I'd rather not put that to the test." You say. "What do you mean you can help?"
"Well..." She looked away, embarrassed. "I mean... my dad has a magic trident. Maybe we could use it to get you back to normal size."
"That's great!"
"It's just..." She searched for the words. "I don't think he'll be very cooperative. Dad doesn't exactly like humans. Or people touching his trident." You deflate visibly, and she's quick to add, "I'm really sorry. Maybe I can talk to him and get him to make an exception?"
Before you can reply, a voice from the sea says "Talk to who?"
---
Is it...

choices: "I think we should tell Sebastian. He could help us."
1212321.content:
At the sound of Sebastian's voice, Ariel immediately grabs you and hides you in her hand.

"Talk?" She stammers out. "Talk to nobod- Flounder!" She corrects herself quickly, then winces at the contradiction. "Nobody or Flounder, whichever comes first."

Sebastian narrows his eyes at her and climbs out of the water. "Ariel, you must return to the palace. The planning for the pre-rehearsal of your sister Attina's wedding is starting in one hour!"

"What's the big deal, Sebastian?" Ariel shrugs. "It's planning for a pre-rehearsal. What difference does it make if I'm there or not?"

"It makes a very big difference to your father." Sebastian says as he starts to lecture. "Not to mention the difference it makes to your sister and her third husband-to-be."

Ariel tried to keep the hand you were in out of sight, just in case, but Sebastian had a habit of pacing while he spoke. Ariel slipped you behind her back and tried to shift her body so she was between you and the crab. Sebastian continued to go on and on about the importance of ceremony, and of punctuality, and other things that you didn't really pay attention to as you tried to stay on the other side of Ariel from him.

After a bit, you lean against Ariel, while Sebastian says something about proper hair-grooming facing away from both of you. Suddenly, he turns sharply, and Ariel quickly shifts to hide you, not realizing what she did placed you right under her butt.

You're trapped under her right butt-cheek, which she apparently has. She shifts just a little bit more so you move to the fold between her buttocks. Yeah, underneath that fish tail of hers, past the scales and the salty fish smell, there was definitely a butt, and you were pressed right into the crack, between the tail and the wet sand beneath you.

Ariel tries not to move around too much, in case it would hurt you, but she can't keep entirely still. It's a little uncomfortable having a little person wedged faceup in your butt-crack.

Not that it's a dream for you, of course. She might not have an anus, or at least not here (mermaid physiology is not something you feel confident in your knowledge about,) but there's still the entire weight of her body pressing down on you. Her cheeks are soft enough, supple even, and you can breathe well enough, but you're absolutely trapped.

"And I suppose you know what you're going to say at the dinner?" Sebastian said, walking toward her.

Ariel slumps forward, taking some of the weight off your chest. "Of course I do." She says.

"Mm-hmm." Sebastian claps his claws together. "Show me."

Ariel straightens up and you feel her full weight again. She gives a brief, from her non-being-sat-on perspective, speech, welcoming the new merman into the royal family and wishing them the best of matrimonial bliss. You can't really hear her, but the vibrations of her speaking make their way all the way down her body, and you can feel them in your bones.

Sebastian considers for a moment, then says "Acceptable."

Ariel slumps forward again and you're able to catch your breath.

"Now, we'd better be heading back to the palace." Sebastian begins making his way into the tide.

"Be right behind you." Ariel says. "Just give me one moment."

Ariel slips off of you and, careful to keep you out of sight, cups you in her hands and brings you up to her face.

"I am so, so sorry." She says, shaking her head. "Are you okay?"

You don't stand, but you give her a weak thumbs up.

"Okay, good..."

1212322.content:
Out from the depths slither a pair of moray eels, each with mis-matched eyes. They remain in the water, poking their heads above the surface.

You slink behind Ariel, just in case, as she leans forward.

"Oh, hello." She says. "Who are you?"

"Friends." Says one.

"Who've heard you have a problem." Says the other.

"Um, Ariel?" You try, but she doesn't hear you.

"As a matter of fact," Ariel says brightly, "My new friend here has a sort of a shrinking problem." She leans in conspiratorially, "We think there was magic involved."

The two eels exchange a glance before one clucks his tongue pityingly. "Dangerous force, magic."

"Very dangerous." Says the other, "You'd need an expert in order to use it safely."

"True, absolutely true." Says the first. "Can't throw it around willy-nilly."

"Oh, but I know an expert." Ariel says. "My father, King Triton, is a master of magical arts. We just need to convince him and we'll be fine."

The two eels give a friendly smile and nod. "Of course," says the first, "No better expert than King Triton."

"A firmer hand to hold a staff there never was." says the second. He hesitates for a moment, then says, "Although..."

"Yes," says the first, "although..."

You climb onto Ariel's lap. Best to stay involved in the conversation, at least.

"Although what?" Ariel asks.

"It's just," Says the first.

"It's only..." Says the second.

"You're friend there is a human." Finished the first.

"King Triton doesn't much care for surface dwellers." Finishes the second.

Ariel bites her lip and looks down at you. She doesn't want to steer you wrong. "I'm pretty sure I can reason with him." She says, "He's not an unreasonable man, he'll understand."

"Not that I mean to argue about your own father," The first says, "but if you're wrong..."

"If you're wrong, what happens to your friend?" Says the second, "Maybe drowned,"

"Maybe fed to sharks," adds the first.

"Maybe incinerated,"

"Maybe kept in a tiny cage, cramped and starved until dying of neglect."

You gulp. That all does sound pretty bad, and not completely out of character for King Triton.

"But..." Says the second, "There's another option."

"Another option?" Asks the first.

"Another option?" Echoes Ariel.

"Well," The second hesitates again, "I only mean, there is..."

Understanding dawns on the first's face. "Oh, yes, I suppose there is."

"Is what?" Ariel presses.

"Ursula." They say together. "The sea witch."

"As much a master of magic as King Triton," Says the first.

"Or at least very near." Adds the second. "It's why she was banished, you know."

Ariel put a protective hand in front of you without thinking. "But isn't Ursula..."

"She has a bad reputation, of course." The second nods.

"Partly earned to be sure," The first says.

"A nasty history, she has."

"But mostly rumor nowadays."

"Nasty phenomenon, rumors."

"Between the two of us," The first beckoned Ariel closer. "I'd heard rumors that the King's youngest daughter was an ugly brat. I never put much stock in them, and I'm proud to say they're wrong."

"Maybe you're right..." Ariel said. She placed you on the sand next to her. "Stay here." She dove into the water, the two eels watching you with markedly friendly expressions. When she surfaced again, she was holding a large glass jar, easily bigger than her head. "This should be safer than my bra, right?"

She climbs back onto the sand and lifts you back up to her face.

"Um, Ariel?" You say, "I have some concerns about this."
1212322.title: Flotsam and Jetsam, Ursula's minions

"I don't... honestly know." You say, looking down at your naked body. "I'm not even sure how I'm maintaining homeostasis." You shiver then, "Aside from 'not that well'."

"I mean, if you don't like the jar idea, we can try something else."

121232222.content:
"Ariel, is it true that a mermaid's kiss can save a sailor from drowning?" You ask.

Ariel claps a hand to her cheek to hide a blush and looks away. "You want to kiss me so soon? But we've only just met." She teases.

"Come on, I'm being serious." You say. You have an idea that just might work.

"Well, it's not just a kiss." Ariel says, "A merperson can breathe new air into a drowning mammal, like a human or a seal."

"Air that you get from the surface?"

"Not always." She motions to her chest. "The air's kept in here."

"So," you brighten as you come closer to the conclusion. "Merpeople take oxygen in from the surrounding water, and some of that oxygen is moved to the lungs, likely to act a secondary oxygen supply for long periods of physical exertion, providing greater stamina."

"Maybe?" Ariel doesn't follow.

"I don't know the evolutionary history of merpeople, so I can't speculate on whether the organ's function started that way and later evolved into lings or the other way around," You say, "or how a merperson's body plan evolves in the first place, now that I think about it, but if I'm correct, there should be a way for me to get an unlimited supply of oxygen."

"From my lungs?"

"Exactly!" Then it dawns on you what that would mean.

Apparently Ariel picked it up too. "You'd have to ride in my mouth."

You cough. "Yeah, I would."

"I mean, I'm not against it." Ariel says, "But is that safe?"

"As long as you don't bite down or swallow me." You say.

One of the eels speaks up from the water. "If it helps, I'm sure Ursula could do something if she swallows you."

"Not much to do about being bitten in half, though." Says the other.

"Your choice." Ariel says.

You thought you were near Atlantica but you realized you didn't feel wet. As you had a hangover, you could barley get a sense of your surroundings. What happened the night before, or anything from before was a blur, aside from having a little too much to drink. Seeing what looked like Atlantica, you notice it's actually an image with a sort of lullaby in the background emerging from a seashell. A big seashell. You make an attempt to close it, but notice a name at the top. It read "Melody". Before you could figure out where you were, a giant hand reached out and grabbed you and the shell.

You look up and gaze upon what you think are two female giants. One looking like a young girl with black hair and white clothes, and the other appeared to be her mom, having red hair and a royal lavender dress. You panic at the sight of the giants, and they get startled by you. Before any conversation can be made, you run to the underside of the ginormous bed and wait until morning. You overhear the two giants saying something about you and the locket you were on. Something about their conversation involved "telling the truth" but you tried to sleep it off, hoping it was all a dream.

The next morning, you wake up under the same bed. You knew now that this is real. You make your way back up the bed but the young giant woke up looking right at you. She picks you up gently and tells you it's alright. Her name was Melody, the same one on the locket. But was she truly friendly?

"I promise I won't hurt you." Melody said. You take this moment to calm down and simply take her word for it. "Okay." you say in relief. "So, who are you?" she asks. "I'm _____, but that's all I can remember apart from getting drunk and passing out. Not sure how I got here, or whether I'm in a world of giants or if I shrunk." you explain. You spend a few minutes talking with Melody, getting to know her and losing fear.

Then you hear a knock on the door. Her mother comes in and sees you're still here. You then get to know her, learning her name is Ariel and that she was once a mermaid. "Melody." she says. "Now that you know the truth, we're going to meet up with my father outside the wall after breakfast." Melody smiles and brings you along for the ride. You ride on Ariel's shoulder to give your side of the story, at least what you remember which isn't much. She's curious about why you were so small compared to her, but got distracted by the meal she was preparing for them.

Trying to stand up, you slip off Ariel's shoulder and fall into one of the glasses of milk. Ariel was oblivious to this and just took the milk to the table. When you finally get a breath of air, the glass your in is lifted and a pair of lips come to your line of sight. Who was drinking you?

It takes only a few seconds for you to realize what it was: a leaf. A gigantic leaf you could use as a sled. Your eyes widening, you let go of the leaf; the branch above you bends back up, rustling whatever plant you woke up under. You look down at the ground...a little twig the size of a hockey stick, a skittering ladybug the size of a baseball...

By some freakish twist of fate, it looked like one of your most perverse wishes had come true: you were now tiny. Only a few inches tall, doomed to wander a world where just about anything and everything was bigger than you. Feeling a little daring, however, you step out from under the plant. As you struggle to get up, you're dimly aware of a series of booming tremors, and they're steadily getting closer. There's another sound mixed in with it, something...melodious. 1551121.title: Maid Marian

15511212.content:
You woke to a purple sky, with a squishy, white surface under you and a sea of pink in the distance.
Wait, what?
Upon closer inspection, you realize that you were on the pillow of a fancy bed, in a stone room. There were curtains covering the bed, which you used to climb down to the floor.
Huh. Not much technology here. After all, they don't even have a clock. "Must be olden times," you thought to yourself. Behind you was a dresser, which a picture fell from and onto you.
"WOAH! WHA-yo! HEY! GET OFF!" You panicked, scratching and waving until the paper drifted to your side. On the paper was a wanted poster, with a drawing of a somewhat handsome fox wearing archer's clothing. He seemed... familiar. Then it came to you.
You were in Robin Hood!
As soon as you knew where you were, the wooden door creaked open and revealed a rather disappointed female fox wearing a maiden's outfit: she was a vixen, in both the literal and figurative sense.
" Oh, my. What a turn of events. Robin Hood is away, Lady Cluck has gone to visit family, and even the village children are asleep." She moped about as she walked to the window.
"It seems there isn't a soul I can play with, or even talk to."
You wished there was something you could do to help. But because of her disappointment, the fair maiden didn't look where she stepped- and. she was about to step on you!
So you yelled out to her.
"Wh-WOAH. WOA-HEY! HEY, MISS! DOWN HERE!"
Does she notice?
15511212.title: Why the long face?

choices: You are feeling quite famished. (gt something to eat)
tell her you overheard her talking about company (playing)
155112121.content:
Just when you were expecting the huge leathery pads under her feet to descend over your tiny body, they soon cease their movements. As your eyes quickly trail upwards, you notice that the pink headdress covering the top of Maid Marians head begins to wiggle slightly. It was obvious that her ears were twitching as if she took notice of something. In just moments, her eyes begin to scan about as if searching the interior of the room. Maybe she could have remembered something she forgot? or, just maybe your voice was heard by the massive vixen?

"Hello?" she calls out. "Is anyone here?" To your ultimate shock and relief, it seemed like your voice managed to reach her ears.

"Down here!" you shout before immediately leaping up and down in order to get noticed. Luck definitely seemed to be on your side today as your efforts prevailed once more. Looming high above you, Maid Marian lets out an audible gasp as she quickly covers her shocked mouth with both hands.

"Gracious me." she stammers, clearly shocked by your strange appearance.

"errr...Good evening oh great Vixen?" You call out trying your best to sound old English in the process. Slowly, Maid Marian crouches down into a kneeling position before gingerly setting her right furred hand down before you.

"g-good evening...little sir?" She replies, still taken back by your odd form nonetheless. Remembering how thoughtful and caring she was in the movie, there was no possible way that she could have any ill will towards you. With that in mind, you carefully clamber your way upon her furred hand before stopping right before her huge palm. Seeing as how you were safe in her hand, Maid Marian ever so gently lifts your form up to her face as her great eyes curiously scan about your body. "My, aren't you a very tiny fellow." she says in a soft voice with slight admiration.

"e-errr...that I am Fair maiden." you reply, finding it much more of a challenge finding words that sounded like this time period. A small giggle escapes Maid Marian as she uses her free hand to daintily cover her mouth. "Do forgive my intrusion, I mean no ill will." you explain.

"There is no need for such worry little one." she replies in her ever docile voice. "though, from whence do you come from?" she asks curiously as her head cocks to the right.

"Errr..." you mutter unsure just how to explain where you originally came from. "I hail... from a far off land. Yes! A far off land filled with such mystery that no one in this kingdom has any knowledge of." you state, which immediately begins to capture the mesmerization of the royal vixen.

"Oh my! you truly must have had a tiring journey." she stammers amazed by the idea of you traveling about at such a size.

"I suppose you can say that." you reply while awkwardly while gazing at her huge orbs.

A warm smile soon begins to draw upon her face as she presses her snout a bit closer to you. "well, feel free to take as long of a rest as you might need." she offers with a small nod of her head. "It's always great to have company around."

Surprised and grateful by her offer, you quickly bow down respectively before her. "Many Thanks fair Maiden." you say in a stoic manner almost like that of a knight. In no time, another small laugh escapes her mouth as she gazes at you happily.

"My, aren't you courteous." she says before slowly getting up and walking towards her massive bed. Upon arriving, she slowly lowers her royal rump upon the pink fabric entering into a sitting position with you still in hand. "Tell me little one, is there anything I could do for you?" she asks courteously.
155112121.title: Yes!

choices: "I'd be happy to partake in this meal with you."
"Though I am perfectly fine, many thanks though."
1551121211.content:
As you gaze upon the massive vixen's face from her padded palm, your stomach suddenly unleashes an audible grumble. Surprised, you gaze downwards at your abdomen with a small blush on your face from the sudden noise. To your surprise however, upon gazing up it seemed Maid Marian overheard it as well. "E-Ermmm...do forgive me Milady." you stammer with an awkward chuckle to boot. "I haven't really ate anything for quite some time." Now that you thought about it, you really haven't eaten anything for nearly all day.

"Tis Alright Little Sir." The kind giantess replies. "Does thou wish for some food to fill thy belly?" She asks gently cocking her huge vulpine head towards the right.

"Wha?" You stutter, taken aback by her sudden offer. "T-Tis fine Milady." You quickly answer. "I do not wish to be a burden towards you." The idea of a royal offering to fetch food for you seemed almost like a broken norm in your book.

"Tis not a problem at all Little Sir." She replies giving a warm smile in the process. Slowly, she begins to rise up into a standing position before gently setting you down upon her soft bedsheet. "I'll be gone for but a moment." She says while raising a single digit up. "Prithee stay put for the time being." She beseeches before making her way out of her room, leaving you alone within the quaint quarters.

Now alone, a deep sigh escapes your mouth as you lazily lie your back upon Maid Marian's bed. "Just what's going on?" you murmur to yourself while gazing up at the wooden ceiling above. Here you were, trapt within some Disney movie at a miniscule size. If you tried saying that to anyone back home, there was no doubt you'd be deemed insane. What made the matters more pressing was the very notion of home. Just how were you going to head back to earth? Let alone was there even some way in returning back there at all? As your mind was still wrapping about your situation in a frenzied manner, the sudden creak of the doorway manages to snap you back to reality.

"Forgive me for my late arrival." Maid Marian says in a meek voice as she approaches you. Upon her right hand seemed to be a plate piled with delicacies as her left hand daintily lifted her pink skirt slightly above the floor.

"No need to forgive Milady." You reply back, putting your old English skills back to the test. Within seconds, Maid Marian places the huge plate of food right besides you before carefully sitting down near the dish.

"My apologies little one. I haven't a clue what it is you eat, so I simply snatched whatever it was that looked appetizing." Maid Marian says while letting loose an awkward chuckle.

"Tis perfectly fine once more Fair Vixen. My deepest Thanks for the meal." you reply back as you gaze upon the large pile of food resting upon the massive dish. To your surprise, and upmost relief, most of the food resting upon the plate seemed to be common food you were familiar with back home. Granted there was no modern food in sight, but you were still grateful with what was available. Quickly, you begin to clamber upon the rim of the plate before clambering up onto the surface. Just as you were about to tug off a section of chicken close by, you immediately freeze as you gaze up at Maid Marian's face. A feeling of guilt begins to linger within you, uncertain if she managed to get something to eat herself. "Ermmm Milady?" You begin. "Does thou wish to partake in eating with me?" You ask stepping back a bit to get a better look at her. "There be plenty of food for both you and I to share upon."

Maid Marian's eyes suddenly beam up as she quickly stifles a giggle from your question. "Thou truly are Courteous little Sir." She states with a warm smile.

So you can eat me!” Tod sinisterly laughed. “You’re smarter than you look. If I were a bit smarter, I would have ran away from you and told Copper.” “Here, you have two choices, Run or I’ll eat you.” “If you go through with this, Tod, you can say goodbye to your friendship with Copper.” “You’re so naive. He doesn’t know.” Tod proclaimed confidently. “I’ll let him know.” “You’re a fool to put your life in anybody’s else’s hands!” “What are you waiting for?” “The time has come for you to make your choice.” “Your fate relies on what you choose, after all.”
What’s it gonna be?

"Oh my! I almost step on you little guy. Wait. Are you human?" Tiana asked.

"Yes I am. I just got this way for what reason? I don't know." You answered.

"Well, that's just terrible. I'm sorry if I scared you." Tiana apologized.

"Don't worry about it. I'm fine." You said.

"That's good to hear. Say, do you have a place to stay?" She asked.

"No. Not really." You answered.

"Well, how about you stay with me until we can figure out your problem?" Tiana suggested.

You think about the offer she's giving you. You want get back to normal. But, maybe you can at least stay with an incredibly cute princess like her. If you say no to her, then you considered yourself as the dumbest small person on the planet.

"I guess it could be fun." You said.

"Good! Now, I need to hide you somewhere." Tiana said.

"How come?" You wondered.

"Well, if I carry you in my hand or shoulder in the public, then it could cause some problems, if you know what I mean." Tiana said.

You think that she could be right. You don't want to be in the middle of some kind of trouble if the people see you like this.

"Good point. Do you have any ideas?" You wondered.

"Well, I do. But, you may find this a little uncomfortable." Tiana said while blushing.

"Huh? What do you mean by th-?" You stopped asking as you've figured out where she's gonna hide you. "Oooooooooooooohhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhh." You said in realization while you blushed madly yourself.

"Yep. It's somewhere underneath my dress. But, someone like you would like that, right?" Tiana said a little smoothly.

"Well, I don't know about that." You said nervously while rubbing the back of your neck.

"Sure you don't." She teased.

"Hey." You complained.

"Alright then, deal." You said.

1553112.content:
You locked eyes with the frog who was standing on two legs for a bit before she broke the silence.
"You're a human, right? At this size?" The female frog inquired.
"Uhh.. yeah. Yeah, I am. " You uncurl and stand up to try and properly greet her, but that proved to be a problem.
Even at your full height, you were still smaller than the frog standing in front of you. You then figured, "I must be REALLY small if a frog is taller than I am." But you had to say something. .So you greeted her, introducing yourself.
"Well, hi. My name's Tiana. I... I'm actually a human, but I got turned into a frog by... unusual causes. Anyway, nice to meet ya."
You shook hands with Tiana, but a small trail of mucus connected your hand to hers after you pulled away. It was slimy and dripped off your hand as you looked at it in disgust.
"Yeah, sorry about that. It's this nasty thing frogs do."
Suddenly, you both heard a clatter of plates and screams. You looked behind Tiana to see another frog jumping around with some wrapped candies. The person he stole it from was flailing her lambs everywhere, trying to swst him away and protect herself.
" Ugh, this Naveen just won't quit!"Tiana yelled to herself before turning to you.
" Sorry, but THAT'S the reason I'm a frog." She pointed at the frog with the candies.
"We're trying to get to this witch doctor to make us normal again. Y' wanna come with us?"
1553112.title: The princess IS the frog!

“Fantastic” She says. “We best keep moving. Only problem is at your size, I don’t think you’d be able to keep up.” She thinks for a minute. “ okay. I have an idea, but you probably won’t like it.”

You wore a shock expression on your face, you must have misheard what she said.

"I'm sorry what?"

"Hehehe" Pocahontas pet your head with her finger. "Silly little one, I said that I will keep you as a pet for my amusement."

You felt the soft skin on her fingertip ruffle your hair really gently. But then you felt anger from that.

"Y-you can't do that!"

Pocahontas stopped petting you and frowned at you. "Why is that?"

You felt fiver shiver up your spine looking up at the giant indian woman in fear, but you wanted to stand up for yourself, who knows maybe she'll understand your feelings.

"I, I'm not a pet, I'm a person, you can't just make me a pet just because I'm small! I have rights, I don't have to be with you if I don't want to!"

You look up to see her still frowning at you staring down at you, her eyes scanning you.

"You may look like a person, but I do not think you can be."

You were shocked how coldly she said that.

"W-what do you mean!"

Her thumb on the hand you were sitting on curled, you looked seeing a giant thumb you scream and try to move but your little head is pressed beneath her soft giant thumb pressed down into her soft hand.

"Ow!"

You felt pain as she pressed her thumb down on you against her palm.

"If you were a person, then a thumb shouldn't hurt." She looked at you squirming beneath your thumb. "A person isn't the size of an insect like you, therefore you do not have these rights as you call them."

You couldn't believe it, this woman seemed so nice a few seconds ago is now explaining how 'might makes right' and is telling you that you are no longer a person because of your person. She kept squeezing your head.

"AAAH!"

Pocahontas looked down at you like you were ungrateful.

"You need an owner to help you, feed you, and bathe you." She explained. "If I let you go an animal or perhaps an insect will eat you, I might as well squish you now."

"Ow! I'm sorry!"

"Does that mean you are my pet now little one?"

You didn't want to be her pet, but what choice do you have?

"Yes! Yes! Please don't hurt me I'm your pet!"

Pocahontas released you letting you sit up holding your head in pain. She then brought you closer to your mouth.

"Ah!" You screamed as her giant lips coved your face. Your face went red not expecting your beautiful captor to kiss you.

"My name is Pocahontas, may call me Mistress Pocahontas." She smiled at you seeing your still flustered from the kiss. "Understand?"

You look up at her beautiful face and know how cruel she can be you nodded.

"Yes M-Mistress Pocahontas."

Pocahontas smiled and stroked you with her other hand, what does she do with you?

You are speechless. You don't know what to say. Being made a pet is something that you never even considered or wanted. It's not what you wanted out of your experience of entering a Disney movie. You shake again but stop and look at her with a serious look "I'm not a pet, I'm man" you hiss as you continue shaking with anger "Don't call me a pet!"
Minnie though can't help but find this whole thing adorable as she says "Oh how cute! You ARE a pet aren't you? You are mine now. Mine! All mine!" she giggles.

Embarrassed and angry you calm yourself down "Let me out of here" you demand in a low and serious voice and take a few steps back shaking the bars of the cage till Minnie says "Oh yes, you are so cute!"
You shake again but then stop as you feel all the anger escape you. You realize how tired you are and just pat the bedding next to you as Minnie looks down at you in the cage.
She smiles at you as you are patting the bedding "Aw are you all tuckered out. There you go my little pet. There is your bed. 1553321121211122223.content:
It was actually quite a nice relaxing walk through the woods. Despite your’s and Alice’s sizes, the trees in the woods were proportioned as though, had you not known that you and Alice were shrunk, you could have almost been perceived to be your normal sizes.

Your eyes darted quickly between your surroundings. It didn’t seem like there was anyone else around, aside from you and Alice. You couldn’t hear any footsteps aside from your own, nor the sound of bugs or anything. The woods were dead quiet.

"Um…" Alice cleared her throat. "How is the dress feeling?" She asked.

You quickly fought back a blush, looking down at your skirt and leggings, briefly running a hand across your chest. "Better than I thought it would." You told her, which was something you’d never thought you’d say. "I have to admit, I wasn't too thrilled about it at first, but it did save my life when we fell down the hole, and…" you too cleared your throat, hastening to add "it is surprisingly comfortable."

"I'm glad to hear that." Alice beamed at you with a rosy-cheeked smile. You smiled back before Alice suddenly gasped. "Look!" She shouted, pointing with one hand and tapping your shoulder with the other.

Alice didn’t need to point. As the two of you came upon a clearing, the oddity was clear:

A porcelain table laden with a plate of cookies and a drink. A peculiar thing to find in the woods, to be certain, but what was perhaps even more peculiar was the ray of light that shined down, cutting through the trees and illuminating the table like a spotlight.

Alice grabbed your hand and ran towards the table, giving you no choice but to follow.

To be fair, you were grateful for the source of warmth, your damp clothes quickly drying in the phantasmagoric light from above, but Alice seemed completely taken by the whole thing, letting go of your hand as she walked towards the table.

You stayed back at the edge of the light, knowing better now not to eat any strange food or drink found on tables. You reasoned with yourself that, while you were still technically shrunk, your present situation belied that, so you felt it best not to potentially make things worse by eating or drinking anything more.

Young Alice though didn’t seem to have learned that lesson. It was almost as though she had completely forgotten what you’d both just went through only moments ago.

"Uh, Alice, I really don’t think that’s a good idea." You tried to tell her, but she just pouted at you.

1553322222222222222212.title: Elsa

15533222222222222222121.content:
You awoke with a shiver, as a sensation of cold slithered down your spine. As you opened your eyes, you saw an endless vastness of white-blue. Realizing that you definitely weren’t in your bed, you rose to your knees and attempted to stand, but found it difficult as the ground was very slippery, nearly causing you to fall. After you managed to stand and rub the tiredness from your eyes, you could only gawk in amazement as you began to take in your surroundings.

You were in a wide-open room made of perfectly flattened ice, which was inset with wispy, intricate designs that fanned out in a snowflake pattern all around you. The outer ring of the reflective floor was marked by eight pillars of ice that shot up toward the ceiling, towering over you like skyscrapers. The ceiling rose into a cone-like structure, which contained an impossibly lavish chandelier that seemed to be providing some of the room’s light.

Then it hit you. Isn’t this Elsa’s castle from Frozen? The answer was yes- it appeared that you were right in the middle of the second floor of the Snow Queen’s frosty fortress of solitude. However, at that moment, you realized that you were having a slight problem beyond being teleported to another world. Great, I’m tiny. I guess the wish gave me the full package.

Looking down at yourself, you saw that you were wearing a sweater and a decently thick pair of trousers. Although, as nice as it was of the wish to have given you proper clothing, the ice castle’s interior wasn't excruciatingly cold. The floor was a bit chilly to the touch, but beyond that the place actually felt pretty nice. Must be her magic or something, you thought. Wait a sec… Elsa’s going to be here!

As if on cue, you heard a pair of footsteps echoing faintly behind the room’s entrance. Elsa was coming up the stairs, and you were at a loss for what to do. What will she do if she sees me? The whole reason she came here was to get away from people… But even if she doesn't find me, what will I do? Go outside and freeze to death?

It appeared that making contact with Elsa was the only way that you were going to get any help. As soon as you finished pondering, the doors to the room swung open and the Snow Queen herself elegantly strode through. She circled the room behind each pillar, examining each with a smile as her lengthy azure ice dress trailed behind her.

As strange as the situation was, you figured that you might as well try and get Elsa’s attention while you have the chance. You shouted and waved, nearly calling her name at one point but stopping yourself when you realized that she’d probably find that weird. However, did she notice you at all?
15533222222222222222121.title: Shrunken in the Ice Castle

155332222222222222221211.content:
As Elsa rounded another pillar, her head suddenly perked up and she began looking around the room. “Who’s there?” she said with a touch of distress in her voice.

“Down here,” you shouted,” near the center!” Elsa’s eyes almost immediately located you. She peered down, squinting slightly as she began to approach you. Her footsteps produced deep echoes as she approached to you and began to dominate your view. As Elsa reached your diminutive form, she towered over you, almost resembling a living mountain of snow thanks to her flowing dress of ice. She bent down on one knee and examined you closely. Her pond-sized eyes met with your minute ones, and for a moment neither you nor she said a word.

“What are you?” Elsa asked with an arched eyebrow.

“I’m… A guy.”

“But how did you become so small?”

“I… Honestly have no idea,” you shrugged sheepishly, figuring that you sort of knew but mostly didn’t.

“Hmm,” the Snow Queen pondered, and then lowered her left hand to the floor. “Let me get a closer look at you,” she softly said. Not seeing any harm in the action, you stepped into her flattened palm and stood as still as possible as she rose back up to her more imposing height. With your fate literally in her hands, you could only look at Elsa’s face and guess what she was thinking. Judging by her expression, she was looking at you as…
155332222222222222221211.title: Yup
