1553322222222222222212111.content:
"Hmmmmm." Elsa kept staring down at you, a strange glint in her huge, sapphire eyes. You're starting to feel a little anxious, lying there in the palm of Elsa's hand, and the way her hand is wobbling a little isn't helping matters any. Then you realize that Elsa's hand...it's radiating body heat just as anyone else would. For a brief moment, you wonder how that ice dress of hers can possibly stay intact if she gives off body heat like anyone else. That train of thought gets derailed, however, when you notice Elsa's other hand coming up. A huge finger, as thick as a telephone pole, creeps ever closer. You try to swat it away, but Elsa's single digit packs more muscle power than your entire body.

That realization of being completely overpowered by this gorgeous titaness, plus the way Elsa's fingertip is probing your body and rubbing your face, assuages your anxiety somewhat. This was your fantasy, wasn't it? You be with a giantess you adored, in a world where you could be touched by true magic? You calm down a little and let Elsa gently examine you with her finger.

"Strange. Even with winter gear, those clothes are so thin...you should've froze long before I found you," Elsa says suddenly.

Your eyes widen a little. So it's not the magic of Elsa's castle that keeps people from dying of frostbite? Was my body chemistry or something changed too, when I shrank? Am I just resistant enough to the cold now, to let me stay here? You're not given too long to wonder about that, however. Elsa withdraws her finger, and then you see her twirling the fingers of her free hand above her head. At once, wisps of snow emerge from her fingers. "Hang on, what are you...ELSA, NO!!"

It was too late. That blast of wintry air swept you off the palm of Elsa's hand. You're now dangling a few feet above Elsa as she looks up, curiously. "So...my power doesn't seem to hurt much, if at all. That's good. It's not like I can throw you out and expect you to survive, and there's the off-chance you could lead others here." You sigh with relief. Despite being traumatized, despite her icy powers...Elsa's heart itself wasn't ice. "But one quick question: How did you know my name?"

Your eyes widen even more. Just when it looked like you were in the clear, that little slip came back to haunt you, big time. You just float there, suspended in midair over the cryokinetic giantess whose eyes have narrowed a bit dangerously. You can almost see your panicked expression reflected in those huge pupils of hers.

"No answer?" Elsa scoffed regally. "Well then, until I get a better idea of just who and what you are, I've got the perfect place for you." With that, she snatches you up out of the air so fast, you're instantly dizzy. Once the vertigo passes, you actually find that being held in Elsa's soft and surprisingly warm fingers is...quite nice. But anxiety creeps back once you realize you're about to be put in....
1553322222222222222212111.title: Interrogated by a cryokinetic.

With her other hand, Elsa has pulled back the fabric of her sparkling ice dress. Just enough to give you a glimpse of the tantalizing cleavage and the inviting softness concealed within. "Somehow, I doubt you'll have much objections to being kept on my person," Elsa says dryly, her booming words pounding in your ears.

"Oh COME ON, Elsa! You wanna go this route with a guy you just met?" you protest. Hopefully that would strike a chord.

Unfortunately, when you look back at Elsa, she just rolls her eyes. But then, the mammoth cryokinetic glares at you again. "It's almost as if you know about my sister, too. Nice try, but now I DEFINITELY want you where I know you can't cause any trouble."

And so, Elsa slowly lowers you inside her dress. Now, you like a good helping of big boobs like any other red-blooded male, but this was just too much! You kick and squirm, but Elsa roughly shoves you in between her breasts, and you wince as the piercing sound of Elsa's breasts snapping back cuts into your ears. Some pale-blue light creeps through the front of Elsa's ice dress, but all in all, Elsa's bosom is a dark place. It's a tight fit too, despite being only a few inches tall. Still, it was definitely a lot warmer nestled in her bosom, even with her ice dress just a few inches away. And the dress she forged for herself from ice...there was some built-in support for Elsa's breasts, and that also ensured you wouldn't slip out of her cleavage and slide down her belly. At least you had that.

Your world lurched again as Elsa walked forward, wrapping her arms around her chest. You squeal in surprise as those walls of flesh close in on you, trapping you in their soft warmth. You almost don't hear Elsa thrusting open the huge doors of her upper balcony. With her arms back out, Elsa's breasts aren't squeezing you as tight. In fact, they're bouncing a little, and jostling you as well. Hope I don't get motion sickness, you think darkly. Just then, you notice a faint glimmer of light from up above. The neckline of Elsa's ice dress...it's only a couple inches or so above you. Carefully, hoping you don't tickle Elsa, you reach up and pulled yourself up, just enough to get a glimpse over the neckline. The sight of a sunrise over the snowy mountains greets you. Such a breathtaking spectacle, and Elsa was sharing it with you. Hopefully, this relationship would improve as the days went by....

15533222222222222222121112.content:
Your heart sinks as you watch Elsa reach out with her free hand. Elsa had walked over to the wall of the highest room in her ice palace. You can see Elsa's face reflected in the icy wall, a mix of regret and concern, but there's also a determination to make sure nothing can threaten her. Or rather, knowing Elsa, run the risk of anyone falling prey to her powers. You would consider trying to talk to Elsa, reasoning with her, but the sight of what she's forging from ice makes you stiffen. Out from that ice wall sprang a pole held sideways, and with another twirl of her fingers, Elsa was crafting a birdcage made of ice!

Before you can even plead your case, Elsa opens the cage door and chucks you inside. You slide along the icy floor of your new home, and slam painfully into the bars. You quickly get up and brush some powdery snow off yourself, then rush back to the cage door. But Elsa's already slammed it shut, and you skid and collide with solid bars of ice again. "Elsa! Please! Let me out!" you plead as you grasp the bars of ice, hoping to get through to the Snow Queen. But Elsa just gazes back at you stonily, her face only a few inches from the cage door. She's so close, you can make out all the details of her skin, beholding a beautiful sight even the best animators at Disney could never hope to recreate. Those huge, inviting, moist lips, those glistening sapphire eyes...you wanted nothing more than for this reclusive monarch to make you hers, as she ruled over an icy domain forever. But Elsa's huge eyes were filled with suspicion, not a longing for romance or companionship.

After glaring at you a moment longer, Elsa shook her head vehemently. Her braid struck the side of the cage, making it resonate all around you. "Even if you're resistant to my powers, to the ice I create...you won't survive getting squashed under my ice shoes. I didn't build this palace for myself, just to have to watch out for little men underfoot all the time. Now you just stay there while I try to find you some food, and once I do...hopefully you'll be ready to answer some questions."

And so, Elsa stormed off, the giantess's footsteps and the clacking of her heels on the icy floor like thunder in your ears. "Elsa, PLEASE! Don't leave me like this!!" you beg of the Snow Queen. But Elsa doesn't even look your way as she descends the staircase, leaving you all alone, like a trapped songbird.

155332222222222222221212.content:
You shout as loudly as you can, but your voice is just too weak to carry very far. Despite the enclosed nature of this part of Elsa's ice palace, you can't even hear if your voice echoed off the walls. This...is going to be harder than I thought, you realize. You bolt toward Elsa, hoping she'll see you if being heard is out of the question. Suddenly, Elsa turns around, but she's still looking straight ahead, completely oblivious to your presence. She takes a step forward, the sound of her icy high heels striking the frozen floor like thunder in your ears. From your vantage point on the floor, Elsa's girth is enough to make the floor rattle. You're close enough to her for the noise to make you wince. When you look up again, you get a heavenly view up Elsa's dress. It's clear she's even fashioned icy undergarments for herself, but the biggest issue is that you see the sole of Elsa's shoe coming straight down.

With a yelp, you try to jump aside, but end up slipping on the icy floor. You cringe as Elsa's foot comes down, convinced this is the end. A booming thud makes your skull rattle, but soon you realize that you're still in one piece. Opening your eyes, you realize that your right under the arch of Elsa's ice shoe. However, Elsa's heel quite nearly splattered your brains across the ice.

Any second now, Elsa will be on the move again. Do I hitch a ride somehow? you wonder. She may not stay in this room much longer.

1553322222222222222212122.content:
You watch as Elsa's gigantic high heel of ice shoots off into the sky, having decided against grabbing onto it. There was no guarantee that you could hold on when Elsa's foot came back down, and in the brief time you'd be dazed, the queen would be long gone and leave you trapped on the upper level. So you run to the side to avoid getting swept up by the trailing skirts of her ice dress, then grab on to the very back of her translucent cape. Thankfully, the gloves you'd mysteriously been gifted with since arriving miniaturized in Elsa's palace blocked out the cold and moisture, so that wasn't a problem. Still, being dragged across the icy floor at what, to you, was a rather dizzying speed is an awkward experience.

With no choice but to hang on for the ride, you look back up at the towering superpowered monarch. From your vantage point, you get quite a good look at Elsa's lovely figure through her ice cape. You remember how Elsa could really pump those hips of hers in the movie, and she certainly isn't disappointing now. For a moment, you allow yourself to forget about the danger and weirdness of your predicament, transfixed by the sight of Elsa's mammoth, shapely ass swaying overhead as she walked back out, the clicking of those high heels over ice still ringing in your ears with her every step. Your macrophilia is kicking into high gear again, and your thoughts dwell on just how big and heavy that perfect ass must be to you know, how much you'd just love to be up close and personal...

Soon, however, you're knocked out of your reverie when Elsa begins to descend the stairs. "Uh-oh," you mutter, anticipating a rather large...

Hanging on for dear life, you steel yourself as Elsa's cape gets dragged down a stair with you on it. It's not as painful as you feared, but it does rattle you to the bone. More and more stairs you are forced to drop down, and all you can do is shut your eyes as you hang on to dear life, smacking into smmoth ice over and over again. Having your fondest wish granted... Law of unintended consequences, especially when the giant woman you'd love to get closer to doesn't even know you exist.

After what seems an eternity, the dropping down stairs ceases, and you dare open your eyes again. Looking back up at the titanic beauty you latched onto, you see Elsa is about to...
1553322222222222222212122.title: Grab Elsa's dress.

15533222222222222222121222.content:
Elsa keeps walking across the ground level of her ice palace, still oblivious to the little passenger who just hitched a ride. With little choice, you hang onto Elsa's cape for dear life, even managing to pull yourself up onto it a little. Now it's only your tiny legs dangling over the cape and dragging across a floor of impossibly smooth ice. Panting from the effort, arms starting to go numb, you look up again at the Snow Queen. There's still the dazzling view of her swaying rear underneath that ice dress, and you notice her hair braid is bobbing a bit too. What you wouldn't give right that moment, to be nestled somewhere in that braid instead...

But before you can dwell too much on such happy fantasies, you notice Elsa opening a door to part of her palace you don't really remember from the movie. She saunters in, but her titanic body takes up so much of your view, you can't really see much past it. All you can see is Elsa spreading her arms, and you notice the sparkle of tiny snowflakes fluttering around her hands, but other than that, you're clueless as to what the queen is up to. Then you feel the cape getting dragged forward again, but there's no deafening click of Elsa's heels. "What's she doing," you begin, but get cut off when the cape suddenly drags its way STRAIGHT UP. This comes so suddenly, you can't hold on, and drop about a foot onto solid ice.

"OwWwWwW," you mutter as you rub your aching butt. Forcing yourself to look up and open your eyes, you see what looks like a huge table made of ice, spreading out to your left and right. But then you see Elsa's right leg dangling off the side. No, it was a gigantic bed made of ice! And peering up again, you see the faint glint of snow up on the top. Elsa must have generated that snow to lie down upon.

"Maybe now's my chance to get her attention!" you cry out in excitement as you run toward Elsa's dangling foot, which is hovering a few inches above the floor. It shouldn't be too hard to jump up onto it, you reason. Still, as you look at the icy footwear hovering over you, you hesitate for a moment. Partly because you're afraid of how Elsa might react when you make contact with her bare skin, partly because you can't believe you're about to ascend the body of a supersized Disney babe. A dream come true!

Taking a deep breath, you bound off the floor and climb up onto Elsa's shoe. As your feared, once you crawl onto the top of Elsa's foot, it begins to shake a little, giving you no time to relish the moment. Thankfully, the hem of her dress isn't out of reach, so you jump onto that and begin your ascent. As you fervently hoped, Elsa can't seem to feel you through her ice dress. Soon you've climbed on top of her knee, instantly transfixed by the view. You can see Elsa's gigantic head on the horizon, her eyes closed, looking so serene in her slumber, though the view is slightly obscured by her breasts.

Your exhilaration is swiftly trumping your worries about Elsa tossing you off in her sleep. You run down the length of her upper leg, the flaky ice of her dress crunching ever so slightly underneath your tiny footsteps. Soon you reach the crotch area, sparing only a glance down at that region before moving on. You're feeling adventurous, not suicidal. As you start to walk across Elsa's belly, you almost lose your balance as it rises while she draws breath. It's still so amazing and humbling, how such a simple action on Elsa's part, done without thought, can affect you so profoundly. It drives home how helpless and puny you are, but you rather like it!

Looking ahead, trying to pace yourself so as not to be thrown off-balance by Elsa's breathing, you see her left hand right up ahead, planted on her chest right under her breasts. At the moment, seeing that huge hand is far more enticing than the soft mounds that linger just beyond. Tentatively inching towards her hands, still mindful of Elsa's rising and falling chest, you examine her hand more closely. The texture of her skin, the flexing of muscle as it moved ever so slightly, the tiny hairs now as thick as dental floss to you... Oh, how you longed for Elsa to scoop you up in her hands. But for now, all you can do is lean over and hug one of her fingers tightly, caution being thrown to the wind.
15533222222222222222121222.title: Sleepy-time for Elsa

155332222222222222221212221.content:
You can't help but smile as you lay down along Elsa's finger and squeeze it tight. It's so surreal, hugging a woman's finger that almost as long as you are now tall, like it's some body pillow. Of course, this particular stand-in for a body pillow has bone within it. You racked your brain for answers, the delirium and blurry vision not helping your cause. What had you been watching?

The ground felt hot... and like pavement. You smelled heat and fire as you tried to clear your eyes. As you did, the feeling of sudden elevation... like you were being pulled up into the air overcame you. Shocked and surprised you scream, flailing as you keeping going higher into the air.

"DON'T YELL!!" you holler back, the irony not lost on you. What the hell were you standing on?
"Oops. Sorry." came the voice, much softer, before giggling.

Your vision cleared, the ringing in your ears died down and you finally got a good clear view of your surroundings. You saw a city around you, a big city at that. But what was wrong with the people? You could bite, sure it would only amount to a little pinch but if you bite hard enough she would defiantly notice it. Even if your biting more skirt then skinned. Thinking some more you decide to go against the idea. You don't want an angry giant at your hand and she hasn't done anything to really upset-

Your thoughts are then cut off as Moana released a giant gas fume of toxic farts from her hole. The sound spelling the end. You try to wiggle away from it however since you couldn't before, you couldn't now. You could only lay there as her farts enter your nostrils and infect your smells. The smell was absolutely terrible. The toxic cloud making your eyes water as well, You've never been a fan of smelling farts, just like most people, but this fart seems to be super powered to the other ones you've smelled. Its like Fifty times worse.

That's it! You don't care if she's pissed!. you open your mouth and with the biggest chomp possible, you bite her. Although it was more skirt then flesh. Moana felt pricked and jumped up. Finally getting of you.

You quickly takes this chance to run away from the poisoned zone, once your out you take a breather. "Did you bite me!?" you hear the Island girl say from behind you, now aware of your presence and very angry that you bit her.

What happens next?
155332222222222222222222222222221121.title: Moana Let's It Go

choices: Innocently;she's going to treat you nice
Mischievously;she's going to play around with her new toy boy
155332222222222222222222222222221122.content:
Moana was still busy thinking about life over the horizon or sea boarders when she kept feeling something moving under her skirt or more specifically her ass and at first ignored it thinking it was a cricket or something many of those found their way into her skirt from time to time and really didn't bit bother her but this 'bug' felt different.

As you continued to squirm around in hopes of avoid getting squashed under this sexy teenaged island chick's rear end you suddenly saw the enormous mountains lift up and a huge face bigger than the sun itself came slowly down glaring curiously at you.

You were in a field position by this time totally scared out of your wits,sure you thought Moana was the sexy,most beautiful Disney character around but you certainly didn't want to be found or worse squashed flat by her! "Please don't see me!" You prayed but in vain as the titanic face leaned ever so closer and Moana reached out with one enormous hand then picked you up.

Once you came to you were big surprise in the giant girl's palm and she was still on the island's shores but only now she was glaring straight at you once she saw you were awake she brought you slowly to her face and you shrank back utterly terrified

"There's no need to be afraid little one,no harm will come to you!" Came Moana's sweet curious voice as you could see the solid brown color and irises of her eyes,the outline of her nose you could fit a plane in and.......

"Are you okay? How did you get that way?" She asked curiously setting you down at her feet and plopping down on her back to face you

"I...I have no idea Miss I just woke up like this!" You confessed not wanting to tell her you actually wished upon a shooting star to be transported here

"So you just woke up like this? Really tiny like a ant? Hmmmmm strange I wonder what could have done this to you? Magic perhaps?" Moana asked

"As I said I have no idea Miss." You replied but she wasn't paying attention instead she began curiously poking you with one huge index finger

"What odd clothes are those you have on?" She muttered outloud staring with utter fascination at your modern day clothes from 2017

"It...it's nothing I made them myself." You lied "I'm really good at weaving clothes!" But again she wasn't listening instead she blurted out

"Are...are you from over there?"

"Over there?" You ask arching a eyebrow

"Yeah you know from the sea,do you live over the horizon? You know over there somewhere?" Moana asked eagerly

"Oh! Yeah I guess I would be my name's....." But the gigantic island teenager beat you to it

"My name's Moana and I'm sorry about sitting on you,you should have warned me ahead of time as you can tell I live on this island but I long to explore other places,to meet other people....oh what am I talking about? You're another person aren't you? A really tiny person but still....." As she without warning picked you up bringing you towards her face again this time however she was smiling....
155332222222222222222222222222221122.title: She does feel you, and discover you

info.brief_description: A story in which you are shrunk in your favorite animated disney movie
info.description:
This is a new shrinking interactive story I wish to work on. In this story, you are transported into your favorite animated disney movie. Awesome, right? Well..... there is a catch to that. You are now shrunk to about a centimeter tall. Well, your day is shot. Well, let's see how we do, shall we? ^^

Here are the rules:
- No growing, you are shrunk for good here
- SOME sexy material applies, but keep it to the age limit
- NO toilet humor, what so ever
- Good grammer, PLEASE
- Has to be from an ANIMATED disney movie
- You can die, but not early
- Make it interesting
- No short paragraphs unless it's a "yes" or "no" question



Have fun ^^
info.pretty_title: Shrunk in an Animated Disney Movie
